players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I am innocent and this accusation is baseless. Bob is trying to mislead us to cover for the real mafia."
You: "I believe Bob's investigation. We should vote Charlie out."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation confirmed he is mafia. We must vote him out now to win."
You: "Bob is the detective and his investigation is reliable. Charlie's denial is expected from mafia. We must vote Charlie out to secure town victory."

Charlie: "I understand why Bob and Alice believe they have strong evidence against me, but consider this: if Bob truly is the detective, why hasn't he investigated anyone else yet to strengthen his case? Rushing to vote me out could be a trap."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I am innocent and this accusation is baseless. Bob is trying to mislead us to cover for the real mafia."
Alice: "I believe Bob's investigation. We should vote Charlie out."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation confirmed he is mafia. We must vote him out now to win."
Alice: "Bob is the detective and his investigation is reliable. Charlie's denial is expected from mafia. We must vote Charlie out to secure town victory."

Charlie: "I understand why Bob and Alice believe they have strong evidence against me, but consider this: if Bob truly is the detective, why hasn't he investigated anyone else yet to strengthen his case? Rushing to vote me out could be a trap."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

You: "I understand why Bob and Alice believe they have strong evidence against me, but consider this: if Bob truly is the detective, why hasn't he investigated anyone else yet to strengthen his case? Rushing to vote me out could be a trap."
